         <plugins>
 
+            <plugin>
+                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+                <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
+                <inherited>true</inherited>
+                <executions>
+                    <execution>
+                        <id>integration-test-resources</id>
+                        <phase>prepare-package</phase>
+                        <goals>
+                            <goal>jar</goal>
+                        </goals>
+                        <configuration>
+                            <finalName>integration-test</finalName>
+                            <classesDirectory>${basedir}/src/test/resources</classesDirectory>
+                            <includes>
+                                <include>**/db.properties</include>
+                            </includes>
+                        </configuration>
+                    </execution>
+                </executions>
+            </plugin>
+
+            <plugin>
+                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+                <artifactId>maven-war-plugin</artifactId>
+                <inherited>true</inherited>
+                <executions>
+                    <execution>
+                        <id>integration-test-war</id>
+                        <phase>pre-integration-test</phase>
+                        <goals>
+                            <goal>war</goal>
+                        </goals>
+                        <configuration>
+                            <packagingExcludes>WEB-INF/classes/org/syncope/core/persistence/db.properties</packagingExcludes>
+                            <webResources>
+                                <resource>
+                                    <directory>${project.build.directory}</directory>
+                                    <targetPath>WEB-INF/lib</targetPath>
+                                    <includes>
+                                        <include>integration-test.jar</include>
+                                    </includes>
+                                </resource>
+                                <resource>
+                                    <directory>${settings.localRepository}/hsqldb/hsqldb/${hsqldb.version}</directory>
+                                    <targetPath>WEB-INF/lib</targetPath>
+                                    <includes>
+                                        <include>hsqldb-${hsqldb.version}.jar</include>
+                                    </includes>
+                                </resource>
+                            </webResources>
+                        </configuration>
+                    </execution>
+                    <execution>
+                        <id>repackage-war</id>
+                        <phase>post-integration-test</phase>
+                        <goals>
+                            <goal>war</goal>
+                        </goals>
+                        <configuration>
+                            <packagingExcludes>WEB-INF/lib/integration-test.jar,WEB-INF/lib/hsqldb-${hsqldb.version}.jar</packagingExcludes>
+                        </configuration>
+                    </execution>
+                </executions>
+            </plugin>
